statements: SELECT * FROM Robotic_Rehabilitation_Progress_Metrics WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT therapy_session_id, session_date, exercise_name FROM Robotic_Rehabilitation_Progress_Metrics WHERE repetition_count > 10;
SELECT patient_id, exercise_name, repetition_count FROM Robotic_Rehabilitation_Progress_Metrics ORDER BY repetition_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Robotic_Rehabilitation_Progress_Metrics WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01' AND session_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, exercise_name, duration_minutes FROM Robotic_Rehabilitation_Progress_Metrics WHERE duration_minutes BETWEEN 15 AND 30 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Robotic_Rehabilitation_Progress_Metrics ORDER BY session_date DESC, repetition_count ASC
SELECT patient_id, therapy_session_id, exercise_name FROM Robotic_Rehabilitation_Progress_Metrics WHERE duration_minutes > 10
SELECT MAX(duration_minutes) AS max_duration, MIN(duration_minutes) AS min_duration FROM Robotic_Rehabilitation_Progress_Metrics
SELECT DISTINCT exercise_name FROM Robotic_Rehabilitation_Progress_Metrics ORDER BY exercise_name
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS session_count FROM Robotic_Rehabilitation_Progress_Metrics GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT * FROM robotic_assisted_rehabilitation_progress WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT therapy_date, therapy_duration FROM robotic_assisted_rehabilitation_progress WHERE patient_id = 2 ORDER BY therapy_date DESC;
SELECT session_notes FROM robotic_assisted_rehabilitation_progress WHERE patient_id = 3 AND therapy_duration > 30;
SELECT * FROM rehabilitation_metrics WHERE therapist_id = 4 AND performance_score > 80 ORDER BY therapy_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(therapy_duration) AS total_duration FROM robotic_assisted_rehabilitation_progress GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_duration > 200;
SELECT * FROM robotic_assisted_rehabilitation_progress WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT patient_id, therapy_date, therapy_duration FROM robotic_assisted_rehabilitation_progress WHERE therapy_duration > 30 ORDER BY therapy_date DESC
SELECT * FROM rehabilitation_metrics WHERE therapy_completed = true AND performance_score >= 80
SELECT patient_id, therapist_id, performance_score FROM rehabilitation_metrics WHERE therapist_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY performance_score DESC
SELECT patient_id, therapy_date, session_notes FROM robotic_assisted_rehabilitation_progress WHERE therapy_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM RoboticAssistedRehabilitationProgressMetrics;
SELECT session_id, date, therapy_duration_minutes FROM RoboticAssistedRehabilitationProgressMetrics ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, specialty FROM Therapists;
SELECT session_id, therapist_id, room_id, start_time, completed FROM TherapySessions WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, session_id, date, therapy_duration_minutes FROM RoboticAssistedRehabilitationProgressMetrics WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RoboticAssistedRehabilitationProgressMetrics WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT session_id, date, therapy_duration_minutes FROM RoboticAssistedRehabilitationProgressMetrics WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT session_id, therapist_name, specialty FROM TherapySessions JOIN Therapists ON TherapySessions.therapist_id = Therapists.therapist_id;
SELECT patient_id, therapy_duration_minutes FROM RoboticAssistedRehabilitationProgressMetrics WHERE therapy_duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY patient_id ASC, therapy_duration_minutes DESC;

SELECT Therapists.therapist_name, COUNT(*) AS session_count FROM TherapySessions JOIN Therapists ON TherapySessions.therapist_id = Therapists.therapist_id GROUP BY therapist_name HAVING session_count > 3 ORDER BY session_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM rehabilitation_progress_metrics;
SELECT patient_id, date, therapy_session_duration FROM rehabilitation_progress_metrics WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, therapist_name FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, physician FROM patient_details WHERE age > 50;
SELECT exercise_name, reps_completed, sets_completed, duration_minutes FROM exercise_log WHERE duration_minutes >= 30;
SELECT * FROM rehabilitation_progress_metrics;
SELECT patient_id, date FROM rehabilitation_progress_metrics ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, physician FROM patient_details WHERE age > 50;
SELECT session_id, patient_id, therapist_name FROM therapy_sessions ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT exercise_name, reps_completed, sets_completed FROM exercise_log WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT * FROM Robot_Joints;
SELECT joint_name, movement_type FROM Robot_Joints WHERE last_recorded_angle > 90;
SELECT patient_name, age, therapist_name FROM Patients JOIN Therapists ON Patients.therapist_id = Therapists.therapist_id;
SELECT progress_id, angle_measurement, session_duration FROM Therapy_Progress ORDER BY angle_measurement DESC;
SELECT therapist_name, specialization, contact_number FROM Therapists WHERE specialization = 'Physical Therapy';
SELECT * FROM Robot_Joints WHERE joint_id = 1;
SELECT joint_name, movement_type FROM Robot_Joints WHERE last_recorded_angle > 90;
SELECT t.therapist_name, p.patient_name FROM Therapists t JOIN Patients p ON t.therapist_id = p.therapist_id;
SELECT tp.record_id, tr.progress_id, tr.angle_measurement FROM Therapy_Progress tp JOIN Therapists tr ON tp.record_id = tr.record_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Records WHERE progress_notes LIKE '%improved%' ORDER BY therapy_session_time DESC;
